hide_charts_title: Hide or show statistics and visuals
hidden_indicator: There are some hidden chart bars. Right click on the chart to call context menu.

notie.one: Forbidden special character(s) in text search input: <b>Â«
notie.six: You must log in to access this
notie.seven: You have been successfully logged out
notie.eight: API call error. Wrong call or no connection with Rethinkdb!
notie.nine: No messages found matching the search criteria
notie.ten: Search by all log lines is chosen. Only last 24 hours is available for this search!
notie.sixteen: Error account processing. Check backend logs!
notie.seventeen: Error bindind LDAP. Check your LDAP_BIND_DN and/or LDAP_BIND_DN_PWD!
notie.eighteen: No LDAP accounts found! Check your LDAP_SEARCHFILTER, LDAP_SEARCHBASE, LDAP_USERNAME_ATTR or LDAP_USERNAME_DOMAIN_PART!
notie.nineteen: This path is not available under LDAP user!
notie.twenty: MLP version has just upgraded! All caches were cleared and you have been logged out! Page will be reload in 5 seconds. If nothing happened refresh page manually.
notie.twenty_one: Start date filter could only be manually removed because of potential performance degrade!
notie.twenty_two: Warning! Empty start date filter will potentially degrade performance!
notie.twenty_three: Share link is successfully copied to the clipboard.
notie.twenty_four: "Date from" can't be set from shared link because "Save filters" is not turned on!
notie.twenty_five: LDAP error. Check backend logs and LDAP settings!
notie.twenty_six: Warning! Fulltext LOG search is very time consuming and resource-intensive!
notie.twenty_seven: Parsing is running. Updated data will be available after process completion. Wait...
notie.twenty_eight: API call error. Rethinkdb output overlimit! Check RETHINK_ARR_LIMIT value in .env and increase it if necessary.

password, and password confirmation

user_settings.current_user_title: Your current logged in user name
user_settings.export_to_xls_title: Export current page contents to Excel file
user_settings.back_to_emails_title: Get back to the emails table
user_settings.show_last_min_title: If "Save filters" is off then you can only change end date field, start date is dynamically filled based on the "Show logs for" slider value!
user_settings.dark_title: Switch current appearance mode (default is based on the browser mode)
user_settings.blur_title: Switch blur modal appearing effect if you have performance issues
user_settings.resizable_title_tip: Right-click to reset columns widths to default equals
user_settings.save_and_load: Save filters (switch on to fully unlock date range filter)
user_settings.save_and_load_title: Save and load filters on page reload

tips.title: Emails filtering tips and some other info
tips.one: All your text search requests are wildcards, so search string will match start, middle or end of found strings. For example qwerty will match qwerty@mail.com, user@qwerty.com and user@mail.qwerty
tips.two: Use start and end date fields to apply date range filter
tips.three: Use "Refresh" button to reload email list with current applied filters
tips.four: Use button to clear all applied filters and reload email list
tips.five: Click the row to show more corresponding email information with related logs
tips.seven: DEFAULT_LIMIT (amount of emails per page) is currently set to
tips.eight: MAX_LIMIT (maximum number for ?limit=) is currently set to
tips.nine: HOUSEKEEPING_DAYS (maximum days of logs storing before cleanup) is currently set to
tips.eleven: Click cell content to set text filter and search_by value to the values of cell content and it's column accordingly
tips.twelve: If "Save filters" is off then you can only change end date field, start date is dynamically filled based on the "Show logs for" slider value!
tips.thirteen: There are all created accounts in the table below
tips.fourteen: To call edit or delele account dialogue click the desired account's row
tips.fifteen: To create new account press
tips.sixteen: Use button to apply text filter and reload email list
tips.seventeen: Permanently hidden from top 10 senders addresses
tips.eighteen: Permanently hidden from top 10 recipients addresses
tips.nineteen: To temporary hide senders or recipients from the corresponding top 10 stats use right mouse click (desktop) or long tap (mobile device) on chosen chart bar and select

api_error.title: Unexpected API error details
api_error.description_default:
The error handler did not provide a more in-depth explanation for why this error occurred or how to deal with it.

If problems persist, please contact the operator of this domain.
api_error.server_description_one: This server is running an instance of
api_error.server_description_two: a Python application which is designed to parse the log output of the Postfix SMTP server (usually /var/log/mail.log), and convert it into easily queryable data inside of
